synthesis_conditions.washing_method: repeated centrifugation (at 6000 rpm for 20 min) and washed by water for three times
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried in an oven at 70 ˚C overnight
synthesis_conditions.yield: over 80% based on the amount of zinc nitrate used
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Hmim to zinc ions molar ratio of 8
